metadata.title: ZOEO White Marble Stone Texture Face Sun Dust Mask Mens Neck Gaiters Magic Scarf Seamless Bandana Outdoor Sport Recreation
features: MATERIAL: 100% Polyester Microfiber. Light, stretchable, comfortable and breathable. Perfect for sports and outdoor activities: running,hiking,walking,cycling,fishing,hunting.
MANY WAYS TO WEARIT: face mask, headband, neck scarf, neck gaiter, hair band, bandana, wristband, beanie, balaclava, hood, helmet liner, yoga session.
SIZE: Length x Width, 18.9x 9.4 inches Thickness is 0.4 MM, high stretchable suit to head circumference 21.25 to 25 Inch. This fits teenagers as well as adults of all ages.

UV, WIND, DUST PROTECTION: This outdoor face sun mask pass SGS UPF TEST. Motorcycle face mask will block up to 95% of the harmful ultraviolet rays from your head, face, neck and ears, and keep your nose, mouth clean from breathing dust. You also can keep one in your hair to prevent mud build up.
COOL DESIGNS: Bandana masks exclusively designed by ZOEO. Digital printing, exquisite and realistic 3D design, fashion design.
description: Brand: ZOEOMaterial: 100% Polyester microfiberSize: one size. 0.1x 18.9x 9.4 inchesMore than 12 ways to use. headband, hear cover, beanie, pirate, neck warmer, face sun mask, balaclava, foulard, wrist band, headwrap, bonnet, neckerchief,ect.Warning: Do not bleach. Reshape, dry flat. Do not iron.
